DOC.detailed_description: Subjects check-in Day -1 remain confined clinical unit Day 13 . On morning Day 1 , subject receive single dose dextromethorphan . On Days 6 7 , subject receive isavuconazole three time daily ( TID ) administer approximately 8 hour apart . On Day 8 12 , subject receive isavuconazole daily ( QD ) . On Day 10 , subject receive single dose dextromethorphan . A follow-up visit schedule Day 21 ( ± 2 day ) .
